job.title: Software Engineer, Web - iWork
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtImagine what you could do here At Apple new ideas have a way of becoming great products services and customer experiences very quickly Bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what you could accomplish ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt We are hiring in Vancouver WA Pittsburgh PA Cupertino CA and Vancouver Canada  ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtAre you interested in creating amazing user experiences on the Web with a friendly and inclusive team Apples iWork team is looking for a passionate engineer to bring their unique perspective and join us in building worldclass apps used by millions of people to get things done at home in their communities and in their jobs every dayltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtSolid understanding of JavaScript frameworks and the challenges in the space preferably with advanced usage of at least one of React Angular Vuejs or SproutCore ltbrgtltbrgtAbility to learn and quickly work with new and unfamiliar technologiesltbrgtltbrgtSolid understanding of objectoriented designltbrgtltbrgtAbility to work collaboratively and communicating ideas clearly within a team and with outside stakeholdersltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtIn this role you will help us craft new and innovative features in Keynote Numbers and Pages and take existing features to the next level Youll contribute to every facet of our large sophisticated codebase from highlevel UI to backend integration with Apples infrastructure You will work with human interface designers or site reliability engineers or quality assurance teams and teams in other disciplines to go beyond code and bring your ideas to lifeltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtThe ideal candidate is pragmatic selfmotivated thoughtful individual with a strong desire to learn and develop technical expertise in a wide array of technologies iWork engineers have exposure to nearly every technology available on Apples platforms get to ship code targeting many of our products and get to learn from experienced engineers Youll be trusted to work with various teams to come up with the best solutions to technical problems and drive their adoptionltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtEducation ampamp Experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBachelors Degree or equivalent work experienceltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtRole Number 200254983ltbrgtltbrgt
